content: by following the instructions of the pattern you can crochet the amigurumi of a **small trophy** ideal for a **keychain** or as a **decorative element ** like all my patterns it is **totally soft** and is also very **simple** and **quick to crochet** the best part it is **free** **size** 2 7″ / 7 cm **difficulty** high **time** 1 h **hook** 2 mm **materials** **golden yellow yarn thickness of the yarn ** 3 mm **hook** according to the thickness of the yarn **yarn needle ** **fiberfill**
